review: This is my second Chromecast.  I have netflix and decided to utilize my internet connection.  I don't have  a cable box on the third floor and Chromecast works great!  Netflixs, Youtube, Xfinity to go, hulu comes through crystal clear.  I can also add channels through my tablet and watch on them tv.  I love this.  If I need to use the computer the grandchildren can still enjoy their favorite shows.  Most tablets work great but I have a Samsung Tab taht works a remote.  Loving this Chromecast!
author: adharris

review: Very easy to play music/movie on television, from iPad.Songs can be added to the chromecast list very easily and no buffer time or lags.Now I love my iPad 1000 times more.
author: vasanth

review: So far I love the chromecast. Very easy to install. Wish that in the future it would mirror what I do in the iPhone or iPad. But so far so good. Great for watching netflix and YouTube. Still trying to figure out if I can use it with a anything else.
author: Krissy

review: You can't really stream movies from you ipad or iphone. Just youtube.Maybe later move video apps will support this, but at the moment they all support apple tv but not Chromecast.
author: Roei Kashi "BiliBoy123"

review: It's amazing.  I'm so used to devices needing to be fiddled with or adjusted and software that needs to have a work around to get it going.  I plugged this thing in, my phone saw it, I typed in my wireless password and was watching Netflix in 10 minutes.  There has been 1 software update that took a few minutes to download, but this has been the easiest, most seamless device I've installed in a long time.  Google does it right.I would like to see the app available in more places.  I have a rooted android phone that is my entertainment interface and I had to install google play app to get the chromecast app.  Not a big deal, but if I could've just downloaded the apk from a website it would've been so much more convenient.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This little device adds a whole new dimension to home entertainment and television viewing.  Excellent deal  and at a good price.
author: lizzylou60

review: My little brother is an avid PC user and gamer.  He was so excited to set up the device and test it out.  The set up was really easy and user friendly.  The casting of tabs was confusing at first but he got the hang of it and uses the device religiously.
author: Paisley

review: What a good value!  $35 bucks for the ability to stream HD video to any HDMI capable TV?  Yes please!!  No lag, no errors or artifacts.  Good quality streaming on a budget.  Thanks Google!
author: Jon Bailey "I got this..."

review: I give this product a 3 because when using apple products they streaming is seamless. It's not until I cast a tab that I have issues. There is a delay in audio, sometime the video is the issue, depending on the speed of the scene that is playing. I am not too impressed with the casting, I was hoping it would play a lot smoother, but it definitely needs more work.
author: Richard Mora

review: Not user friendly - having many issues with installing it on the TV and linking it to our network. Very frustrating!!
